title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and CLI for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a simple API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-ai/npm package
summary: Community TypeScript wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with additional utilities and strong typing.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing chat, generate, pull, and embedding endpoints with async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; chat, generate, pull, and list local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama written in Go featuring conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads, and user management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks for Ollama with CPU and GPU variants plus Open-WebUI sidecar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-crewai
summary: CrewAI tool that lets autonomous agents run local LLM inference via Ollama for planning and reasoning.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands, thread chats, and model switching.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama providing DM and channel chat with configurable model per channel.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that connects to Ollama for local LLM conversations with session memory.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama for embeddings and generation plus Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside workflows for summarization, translation, or custom prompts.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service container for CI pipelines needing local LLM calls.
